## ARGOS locations for one male Ruff.

See [`ruff143789`](../reference/ruff143789.html) for more information on the dataset. 



```{r}
#| label: map-ruff
#| message: false
#| output-div: ruff

data(ruff143789)

ctdf <- as_ctdf(ruff143789, time = "locationDate") |>
  cluster_track()

map(ctdf)

summary(ctdf) |>
  head()

```
